scripts.build: npm run fix && npm run build-nofix
scripts.build-apps: npx eslint ./src/apps/code --fix && prettier ./src/apps/code --write && npm run build-apps-postprettier
scripts.build-nofix: rm -rf build/* && npx tsgo && echo npm run build-d-ts && npm run build-apps-postprettier && node -e "console.log(Date.now())" > build/date.txt
scripts.newenv: npm install && git submodule init && npm run build
